reviewText: Saw this on PBS and glad to find it for our collection.  Comes in Spanish but easily adjusts to English.  Verrry interesting - Youth & Adults will enjoy !!

Wao!!! it's all!!! wao!!! there is not a words for to describe the quality of this documental for anyone like me!!! My students love it!!! and is my task to say you that this DVD change the life of ten of my student that to decide study biology thanks to this documental!!! And... We participated in a biology competition to inspired in the work of the scientists that appear in this documental!!! So... thank you is very tinny word for to show gratitude to make works like this documental!!! This biology teacher from Costa Rica to give thanks for ever!!
